name: Asteroid Escape (Link_Berbert)
description:
After being hired for a deep space mining company, you are tasked with mining inside of one of the most dangerous asteroid belts in the galaxy. Unfortunately for you, an explosion within the asteroid has compromised the mining procedures and you must find your way out. Escape each of the different facilities without hitting any of the walls or running out of oxygen if you wish to survive.

Good Luck Employee #4471839

(Note: This was a student game made in one semester by a team of 7)
